query:
ALTER TABLE role_permissions 
CHANGE COLUMN roleId role_id INT NOT NULL,
CHANGE COLUMN createdAt created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
CHANGE COLUMN updatedAt updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2FYRcYGi4pb6onw.cb424ff095fe --database Rjwg2XpN7AjHEkC6dWznWM --execute ALTER TABLE role_permissions

CHANGE COLUMN createdAt created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
CHANGE COLUMN updatedAt updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL;
